globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You move through the forest overgrowth and spot the facility guards posted ahead. Your Wookiee companions snarl, eager to wreak as much havoc as possible.

{-} Deploy the Wookiee Warriors to the red highlighted spaces.
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When the first Wookiee Warrior is defeated, withdraw the entire group in the app.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the base is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Wookiee Warriors are defeated.

{-} When the first Wookiee Warrior is defeated, withdraw the entire group in the app.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the base is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Wookiee Warriors are defeated.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Your pilot dives into the fray with her shuttle, pulling you and your companions to safety.  You look down at the obliterated Imperial base and take great satisfaction in a job well done.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Wookiee Warriors as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The Imperial forces overwhelm and surround you. You manage to break free and make for the woods, but you realize too late that the Wookiees were not so lucky. Your friends and allies are now in the hands of the Empire.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Monitor Destroyed 1
globalEvents.eventText: The monitoring terminal explodes in a shower of sparks.

entityProperties.name: Monitor 1
entityProperties.theText:
The monitoring terminal is processing data gathered for the Empire on Kashyyyk.

{-} The terminal can be attacked (Health: *1*+1, Defense: 1 {G}).

globalEvents.name: Well-Guarded
globalEvents.eventText: The blast door slides open to reveal a small facility full of monitoring equipment.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: A simple blast door leads into the facility.

eventActions.theText: Processed data is running across a multitude of screens.

entityProperties.name: Monitor 1
entityProperties.theText:
The monitoring terminal is processing data gathered for the Empire on Kashyyyk.

{-} The terminal can be attacked (Health: *1*+1, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.theText:
{-} The monitoring terminals can be attacked (Health: *1*+1, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when all monitoring terminals are destroyed.
Imperial forces are already waiting for you.
Block access to the monitoring terminals.

{-} When the first Wookiee Warrior is defeated, withdraw the entire group in the app.
{-} The monitoring terminals can be attacked (Health: *1*+1, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when all monitoring terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Wookiee Warriors are defeated.

globalEvents.name: Defense Protocol Closed
globalEvents.eventText: More Imperial soldiers arrive, carrying an intimidating blaster cannon.

globalEvents.name: Defense Protocol Open
globalEvents.eventText: More Imperial soldiers arrive, carrying an intimidating blaster cannon.

eventActions.theText: Suddenly, the blast door slams shut again and locks.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
The blast door is locked tight.

{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with the door {I} to try and open it. The door does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with the door {I} to try and open it.
{-} The door does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.

{-} When the first Wookiee Warrior is defeated, withdraw the entire group in the app.
{-} The monitoring terminals can be attacked (Health: *1*+1, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with the door {I} to try and open it.
{-} The door does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when all monitoring terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Wookiee Warriors are defeated.

You start picking the lock.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

globalEvents.name: Lock Picked
globalEvents.eventText: The door slides open again.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: A simple blast door leads into the facility.

globalEvents.name: Final Defenses
globalEvents.eventText: With a burst of static, a hovering probe droid appears, its optical sensors trained on you.

globalEvents.name: Escape
globalEvents.eventText: The last of the monitoring terminals explodes. All that is left now is call your extraction - and survive until it arrives. Your emergency beacon is already waiting for you outside.

entityProperties.name: Beacon
entityProperties.theText:
Your emergency beacon is ready to call in the extraction.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the red terminal to call for an extraction.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the red terminal to call for an extraction.
{-} If a Rebel figure calls for an extraction, the extraction will arrive at the start of the next Status Phase.
{-} The Rebels win when the extraction arrives.
Block access to the emergency beacon.

{-} When the first Wookiee Warrior is defeated, withdraw the entire group in the app.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the red terminal to call for an extraction.
{-} If a Rebel figure calls for an extraction, the extraction will arrive at the start of the next Status Phase.
{-} The Rebels win when the extraction arrives.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Wookiee Warriors are defeated.

globalEvents.name: Extraction called
globalEvents.eventText:
You quickly signal your pilot that you are ready for extraction. "Incoming!" she calls out via comlink. "Prepare for a quick escape, I'll be there in a second!"

{-} The extraction will arrive at the start of the next Status Phase.

entityProperties.name: Beacon
entityProperties.theText:
Your emergency beacon is ready to call in the extraction.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the red terminal to call for an extraction.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When the first Wookiee Warrior is defeated, withdraw the entire group in the app.
{-} The extraction will arrive at the start of the next Status Phase.
{-} The Rebels win when the extraction arrives.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Wookiee Warriors are defeated.

globalEvents.name: Wookiees Defeated
globalEvents.eventText:
As his comrade falls, the remaining Wookiee roars in grief and anger, then lunges at the Imperials.

{-} Replace the regular Wookiee Warriors Deployment card with the <color="red">Wookiee Warriors</color> Deployment card in the same position (ready or exhausted). The remaining Wookiee Warrior now corresponds to that Deployment card.
